name: store 2 VR
description:
A Picking-Up-Snacks-For-Friend's-Party-At-Convenient-Store  Simulator in VR.

REQUIRES INTERNET CONNECTION FOR VIDEO

Right now this game is only available for the Vive. Oculus Support coming soon.

CONTROLS:

  • Teleport - Push Trackpad on Right Hand
  • Grab/Hold - Triggers on Both Hands
  • Steal - Hold Object behind head (where a backpack would be)
  • Answer Phone Call - Options Button on Left Hand
  • Reject Phone Call - Push Trackpad on Left Hand
  • Use Phone NFC - Hold Left (phone) hand up to NFC Area
  • Reset Store - Grip button on both controllers at the same time

Special thanks to Chloi Rad (@_chloi)
